version_description:
1.2.6 (Oct 2015)
+ Experimenting with multi-language translations: Added partial support for Chinese Traditional/Simplified, Korean, French, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Bahasa Indonesia, Filipino and Hungarian (Thanks so much the Tone Sphere community!)
+ New playable songs:
Banvox feat.core mc - Open Your Eyes (Original Mix)
nanobii - pineapple spaceship
RANDO: - Out of your love (Exhaust Mix)
Sta - Chroma
+ Added the comic-strip-like Lesson level
+ Added "Cosmic" explosion theme
+ Added Sync Calibration
+ Added About screen
+ Added Sphere rank and adjusted former hidden stages based on this mechanism
+ Added pictures while loading
+ Added Easy level for STAGER
+ Added new Hard level for Aliceblue, Already Seen, Crossover, Hello World !!, Lovesick, Middle and Unified Chaos. Existing Hard levels have been moved to Expert
+ New album art for Aliceblue, Negator, Unified Chaos and Finite (some levels)
+ Result screen redesign #2
+ Slightly remastered and volume re-adjusted audio for almost all songs
+ Remastered background stage for Negator
+ Some changes have been made for the background stage in Canopy on the Planet for mostly cosmetic reasons + some adjustment on the album art
+ Changed the song title font in the gameplay screen
+ New title font for Sweets Holic
+ Many difficulty rate changes. Press/Start now goes up to 7.5 and Solarsphere goes up to 12
+ Minor adjustments for Aliceblue (Hard), Crossover (Normal/Expert), Finite (Normal/Hard/Expert), Hello World !! (Normal/Expert), Le Petit Prince (Normal/Hard), Lovesick (Normal/Expert), Ninth (Normal/Hard/Expert), Otome (Normal/Hard), Souten (Normal/Hard/Expert), Unified Chaos (Normal/Hard) and *Twinklesky* (Normal/Hard/Expert). Note: maximum achievable score for Finite (Normal) has been bumped.
+ Changed free slides on Conflict (Normal) to directional slides
+ Re-adjusted timing on FLOAT MIND and Canopy on the Planet (was early)
+ Adjusted scroll speed for some levels
+ Added an obscure bonus mod...?
---
+ Backgrounds won't be skipped in the older devices during autoplay
+ When the score surpasses max. achievable score for its chart, it won't be reflected in the total score from this version
+ Disabled "No misses" sound during autoplay
+ Fixed angle notes didn't work properly when combo display is turned off

1.4.0
+ First partial release for the final 1.4.0 series update
+ Added Sphere Map mode. Now you can use the pluck out of your lumina!
+ Added new songs and levels for Darksphere/XXXL (unlockable via Sphere Map mode)
+ Difficulty rating adjustments for Press/Start and Solarsphere
+ You can retry sending your score to the server by tapping four times at the Lumina icon at the upper-left corner in the result screen
(for those with unstable internet connection)
+ Added SSL compatibility

1.5.0
+ Added the final bonus cake
+ Network connectivity fix

1.4.6
+ Added new songs and levels
+ Updated and even more spacey Sphere Map
+ Added Comic Replay button in Sphere Map
+ Improved loading speed for Sphere Map with older devices
+ iPad Air: Touch recognition adjustments
+ Renewed the cautionary note for those who try to plunge into Darksphere before playing even one level
+ Various bugfixes

+ It's my liiiife! What a Conway's children we are!
Added totally new Sun and Moon episode with five more songs! (this is an expansion pack/DLC)
+ Added two even more new songs and expanded Sphere Map
+ Added multiple new hitskins. Those new colors will light and paint up my used-to-be-dark room excessively and gorgeously.
+ Fixed online score can't be loaded via browser feature
+ Misc bugfixes

+ It's my liiiife! What a Conway's children we are!
Added totally new Sun and Moon episode with five more songs! (this is an expansion pack/DLC)
+ Added two even more new songs and expanded Sphere Map
+ Added multiple new hitskins. Those new colors will light and paint up my used-to-be-dark room excessively and gorgeously.
+ Fixed online score can't be loaded via browser feature
+ Misc bugfixes
+ (1.6.1) Minor crash bug fix

+ It's my liiiife! What a Conway's children we are!
Added totally new Sun and Moon episode with five more songs! (this is an expansion pack/DLC)
+ Added two even more new songs and expanded Sphere Map
+ Added multiple new hitskins. Those new colors will light and paint up my used-to-be-dark room excessively and gorgeously.
(1.6.2)
+ Made a bit easier to hit back button during the gameplay
+ Fixed potential crash when IAP is loaded repeatedly

(1.6.3)
+ Modified "Sunburst" hitskin slightly larger
(1.6.2)
+ Made a bit easier to hit back button during the gameplay
+ Fixed potential crash when IAP is loaded repeatedly

+ Slightly renovated the result screen
+ Fixed iCloud not working properly
+ Fixed "About this game" screen looks a little strange in iPads
+ Arrested other pesky bugs wholesale

+ 42% more beautiful title screen (Optobot says so - your sphericalage may vary)
+ Added a mechanism to mitigate unresponsive touch issue at the top/left edge of screen when 3D Touch is enabled (disabling 3D Touch when applicable is still recommended due to possibly delayed response).
+ Extended language support for Spanish, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional and Korean
+ Fixed cloud sync importing calibration settings from non-iOS devices
+ Other minor fixes

Tone Sphere 1.7+ "Empyreal Bon Voyage"
1 Million DL Anniversary!

+ Added "Empyreal Bon Voyage" DLC with 5 new songs, mini sphere map!
Including a collab by Kyle Nagai (J-Academy Award winner) and Sta, young chiptune legend Mr.Asyu, etc.
+ Vandalize the universe with Derrida and her speaker Endu (familiar faces too).
+ Added space warp
+ Added Spherical Report Card

+ Added the new ep "Six Seconds Later".
A candle once lit, in a second surge to an end!
+ Bugfixes
+ Yunesko would like to inform you that WRLDS has been added to this version by default.

+ Added the Darksphere ending and the new song Supersymmetry.
Thanks for playing, our spherical deity!
